application

Class SettingsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.SettingsController

  • public class SettingsController
extends java.lang.Object

    This class acts as controller class for the Settings.fxml file

    This is the class which handles the settings page
    Author:
    hrithik

    • Method Detail

      • changed

        public void changed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws SameColorException
        This method is used to handle the event when the user tries to change the color of the orb correponding to a player.
        Parameters:
        event - This is the ActionEvent which is generated when user changes color for a player
        Throws:
        SameColorException

      • backtomenu

        public void backtomenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to handle the event when player clicks the menu button on the settings page. It simply loads the Mainmenu.fxml page.
        Parameters:
        event - This parameter is the ActionEvent which is generated when the user clicks the menu button.
        Throws:
        IOEException
        java.io.IOException

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Initializes this class objects when Settings.fxml is loaded

      • calldefault

        public static void calldefault()
        This method is used to initialize the class objects and call the setdefaults() method only once.

      • setdefaults

        public static void setdefaults()
        This method is used to define the default color of the players.

      • getindex

        public int getindex(javafx.scene.control.ColorPicker c)
        This method is used to get the index of the earlier defined colorpicker objects.
        Parameters:
        c - This is the first paramter whose index we find
        Returns:
        int This returns index of the parameter (colorpicker)
